intro: Explore hidden variations and engage with exciting new challenges in Just Find It 4!
description:
As you progress through the exciting new levels, you can expect many new scenes and minigames. 
Spend hours exploring the game and solving its difficult puzzles. 

As you make your way through each level, your abilities and attention to detail will be put to the test!

- Play 7 kinds of games!
- Search for bonus collectibles and extra hidden object challenges!
- Make matches, find details, memory, montage, and swap tiles, too!
- Play through the game in any order you want!
- 10 extra bonus levels!
